coreAttributes.name: ChainSword
coreAttributes.description: A mix between a sword and a chainsaw to mow down the heretics by the hundreds. The weapon of choice of the space marines.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of the chainsword, the Emperor's will. For the Emperor!

hitDescriptions.hitText: Gripping the blade with [npc.namePos] strength, [npc.name] [npc.verb(strike)] at [npc2.name], the teeth pierce [npc2.herHim] with righteous wrath.
Gripping the sword tightly, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slice)] [npc2.name] with rage and purpose.
Looking at [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(take)] the chainsword one hand thightly and [npc.verb(strike)] down [npc2.name]!

missDescriptions.missText: Gripping the blade with [npc.namePos] strength, [npc.name] [npc.verb(strike)] at [npc2.name], the teeth pierce [npc2.herHim] with righteous wrath. [npc2.Name] [npc.verb(dodge)] the blade but barely.
Gripping the sword tightly, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slice)] [npc2.name] with fierce speed. Giving [npc2.herHim] a chance to avoid the menacing chainsword.
Gazing upon [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(take)] the sword with one hand and [npc.verb(strike)] down [npc2.name]! This pride however, was enough to give [npc2.Name] a chance to escape death.
